description: Back at the bar, its time to close up. Bartenders Edu Boxer and harness-wearing Manu Maltes are about to clean up, but a well-sculpted bar patron, Marcos DeSilva, has stayed behind. The guys get down to business in a sweaty threesome, doing it on the bar, on the stools, on the floorâ€”everywhere! Both Boxer and Maltes take their turns fucking DeSilva, jacking their loads all over him at the end.
title: Closing Time: Edu Boxer, Manu Maltes, and Marcos DeSilva
